scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Archangel Michael, clad in armor and a red cape, poised to strike a red-skinned demon with a sword raised above his head. Michael has large, grey wings and a halo. The demon, with horns and sharp teeth, appears to be recoiling. In the background, a hilly landscape is dotted with stylized trees and a distant city with several towers and buildings. The overall scene represents the triumph of good over evil.
scene_interpretation: The Archangel Michael battling the demon
